title: [NA][Plat2+][Team of Diamond-Plat LF Mid/Jg]
body:
Hello, My name is ButterloverxD, captain of a serious team looking for a p2+ mid or JG Main. We will be practicing 5 times a week and intend to compete in a league as well as various tournaments.

This team is intended to be competitive, meaning we need a commitment to be on time and ready for practice. We also ask for applicants to be willing to look at high elo replays and self review their own vods.

We have strict practice and will need applicants to be able to handle the criticism that reviewing vods will bring.

Requirements-------

At Least gold in flex queue. This is to be able to play with the team for practice when we do not have scrims set up beforehand.

17 years of age or older.

Available at least 5 days a week from from 7pm-11pm est (Days and hours are flexible).

Discord and a working microphone

Recommendations----------

Large champion pool that encompasses meta champions.

Discipline and punctuality

Positive mindset (Mental strength)

Confidence to speak up in and out of game.

Optional ----------

Shot-calling experience (Highly recommended)

Experience in other roles

Please fill this out ---------

Ign:

Rank solo and flex:

Availability:

About you:

Strengths:

Weakness:

Why you want to join:

Top 5 Champions:

Any other champions you are proficient on:

Thanks for reading and I hope to get back to you guys soon!

Please post in this thread if you want your application to be read. Don't Friend me

replies.body:
Ign: Dotrix

Rank solo and flex: P3 Solo Queue (was almost P1 but I tanked down a couple weeks ago, I got there once though so I can easily get there again after this unlucky losing streak turns around) P5 Flex gaining upwards of 30 LP per game and climbing fast.

Availability: Flexible after August 3, Tuesdays Wednesdays and Thursdays tend to be best until then

About you: I've competed in several online leagues, against local colleges, and have a little bit of coaching experience as well. I've also played on two low diamond teams. I don't tilt at all really (unless we are just joking around and wasting time during practice), and I play every game until the very end without surrendering.

Strengths: Teamfighting, consistency, damage calculation, and playing from behind. Even if I'm against a much better player, more often than not I'm able to contain them and lose gracefully in the worst case scenario. In other words it's not easy to shut me down and snowball on me. I'm pretty vocal usually, and I'd say I'm an average shotcaller if you need me to fill in for that role (my style is a bit micro manage-ey though so some people love it and others hate it). I'm also pretty punctual and organized, so I almost always come a little bit early to practice. I also can assist with the google docs/scheduling scrims etc.

Weakness: I could improve on roaming more and being faster on rotations. I have much fewer issues in these areas if we have a very vocal shotcaller though. I'm also aware that sometimes when I think out loud, some of my more sensitive teammates in the past have gotten tilted. It's not my intention to be nitpicky or anything but I'm not thinking about my tone of voice etc mid-game, I'm thinking about the game. My champion pool is another thing I'm addressing because the difference in comfort between my best champions and my average champions is night and day, and I'm trying to close up that gap a little.

Why you want to join: I highly prefer team environments over solo queue

Top 5 Champions: Azir Viktor Orianna Syndra Malzahar

Any other champions you are proficient on: I used to be solid on Zed and Brand but I'm very out of practice. I'm also learning Corki, Cass, Galio, and Lissandra but I'm not very comfortable on those characters yet
